greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(3*n)=2*n, a(3*n+1)=a(n)+n, a(3*n+2)=2*a(n), a(n)=0 for n<3.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = (n mod 3) * a(floor(n/3)) + (2 - n mod 3) * floor(n/3), a(n) = 0.
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 26 2008
